Verses: 1 akkaalaththile Karththar Livyaadhaan Ennum Neenda Paambai, Livyaadhaan Ennum Konalaana Sarppaththaiye, Kadidhum Peridhum Balaththadhumaana Thamadhu Pattayaththaal Dhandippaar; Samuththiraththil Irukkira Valusarppaththaik Kondrupoduvaar.
2 akkaalaththile Nalla Dhraatcharasaththaith Tharum Dhraatchaththottamundaayirukkum; Adhaikkuriththup Paadungal.
3 karththaraagiya Naan Adhaik Kaappaatri, Adikkadi Adharkuth Thanneerppaaichchi, Oruvarum Adhai Sedhappaduththaadhapadikku Adhai Iravumpagalum Kaaththukkolven.
4 ukkiram Ennidaththil Illai; Mutchediyaiyum Nerinjilaiyum Enakku Virodhamaai Yuththaththil Konduvarugiravan Yaar? Naan Avaigalmel Vandhu, Avaigalai Egamaaik Koluththividuven;
5 illaavittaal Avan Enbelanaip Patrikkondu Ennode Oppuravaagattum, Avan Ennode Oppuravaavaan.
6 yaakkobu Verpatri, Isravel Pooththukkaaiththu Ulagaththai Balanaal Nirappum Naatkal Varum.
7 avar Avanai Adiththavargalai Adiththadhupola Ivanai Adikkiraaro? Avargal Kollappadum Kolaiyaai Ivan Kollappadugiraano?
8 dhevareer Janaththaith Thuraththividugaiyil Mattaai Adhanode Vazhakkaadugireer; Kondalkaatradikkira Naalile Avar Thammudaiya Kadunkaatrinaal Adhai Vilakkividugiraar.

9 aagaiyaal, Adhinaal Yaakkobin Akkiramam Nikkirampannappadum; Thoppuvikkiragangalum Silaigalum Ini Nirkaadhapadi Avargal Palipeedangalin Kallugalaiyellaam Norukkappatta Sunnaambu Kallugalaakkividumpodhu, Avargaludaiya Paavaththai Avar Agatruvaarenbadhe Adhinaal Undaagum Balan.

10 aranaana Nagaram Avaandharaiyaagum, Andha Vaasasthalam Thallundu Vanaandharaththaippola Vittuvidappattadhaayirukkum; Kandrukkuttigal Ange Meyndhu, Ange Paduththukkondu, Adhin Thazhaigalaith Thinnum.

11 adhin Koppugal Ularumpodhu Odindhupom; Sthreegal Vandhu Avaigalaik Koluththividuvaargal; Adhu Unarvulla Janamalla; Aagaiyaal Adhai Undaakkinavar Adharku Irangaamalum Adhai Uruvaakkinavar Adharkuk Kirubaiseyyaamalum Iruppaar.
12 akkaalaththile, Karththar Aatrankaraiyin Vilaivuthodangi Egipthin Nadhimattum Poradippaar; Isravel Puththirare, Neengal Ovvoruvaraai Serkkappaduveergal.

13 akkaalaththile Periya Ekkaalam Oodhappadum; Appozhudhu Aseeriyaadhesaththile Sidharadikkappattavargalum, Egipthudhesaththile Thuraththividappattavargalum Vandhu, Erusalemilulla Parisuththa Parvadhaththile Karththaraip Panindhukolluvaargal.
